doc.title: 4 on the Floor
doc.plot: The Ancient One - Ancient kung fu master, Don Lee, has defeated and frustrated his opponents for decades...he would now like to show the world this astounding "move". George and Martha - Humorous political satire talk show featuring George and Martha Washington in a fireside chat. What's Brewin' Craig? - A DRM film production crew interviews zany folks on the street asking if they are familiar with Craig Brewer's films. Yer Anus in the A.M. - "Don Anus" is bewildered as to why he was replaced on his popular radio talk show for some remarks that he does not consider offensive.
